mapper.update: update deliver set deliver_name = #{deliverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_phone = #{deliverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, home_addr = #{homeAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employ_date = #{employDate,jdbcType=DATE}, restaur_id = #{restaurId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where deliver_id = #{deliverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select deliver_id, deliver_name, deliver_phone, home_addr, employ_date, restaur_id from deliver
